item.title: Bitcoin falls below $100,000 for the first time since late June
item.description: Cryptocurrencies retreated Tuesday as investors continued to flee risk-on assets.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Uber, Sarepta, Palantir, Norwegian Cruise and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in the premarket.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Uber, Hertz, Norwegian Cruise, Yum, Palantir and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Palantir, Hims & Hers Health, Clorox and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Ether falls 7% following a multimillion dollar hack of a decentralized finance protocol
item.description: The Ethereum-linked token briefly fell below its critical $3,600 level as investors wrung their hands over several bearish events.
